CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: full metal jacket (7.62x51)

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: hollow point (7.62x51)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A hollowed out tip causes the bullet to expand on impact, increasing tissue damage at the cost of armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing incendiary (7.62x25)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with an incendiary compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and potentially igniting targets.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing incendiary (.50 BMG)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with an incendiary compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and potentially igniting targets.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing incendiary (12.7x108mm)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with an incendiary compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and potentially igniting targets.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: EMP (.408 Chey Tac)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Creates an electro-magnetic burst on impact, temporarily disrupting electronic systems and Mechanoids.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing discarding sabot (.50 BMG)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing discarding sabot (12.7x108mm)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing high-explosive (.50 BMG)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with high-explosives that detonate on impact for additional damage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing high-explosive (12.7x108mm)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with high-explosives that detonate on impact for additional damage.
